_header: Adam and Eve that were unwise
Subjects: carols; Virgin Mary, songs in honor of
_description: A carol to the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (abab) with refrain and two-line burden: ‘Salue regina gloria / Mater misericordie’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Adam and eve thatte were vnwyseWere putte with there
                    posterite…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Butte into blysse thatt he us takeMater
                        misericordieSalue regina glorieMater misericordie
CULEe112.Note: Not attributed to James Ryman in the MS.
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 299.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 154; 1977, 137.
